name: Diver Down (ShadowBand)
description:
You awaken at the bottom of the sea. The members of your dive team are scattered along the seafloor and horrific sea life patrols the area. And what about those peculiar gems?



"Diver Down" is an underwater horror game about recovering your team, 6 in total, and making it back from the depths alive. Use sonar to your advantage, and out maneuver the nightmares lurking in the darkness. Can you face the creeps of the deep and live to see another day? Or will you end up floating on the surface?

NOTE: 2 versions available, make sure you pick the one that's right for you! ( Keyboard or Gamepad )
